item.content:encoded: Series briefly resumed serialization in 2021

item.content:encoded: Short-term manga is serialization of 1-shot that appeared in U.S. print release of <cite>Weekly Young Magazine</cite> last year

item.title: Tamon's B-Side ‒ Episode 8
item.content:encoded: If housekeeping doesn’t work out for her, Utage’s got quite a future in printing, graphic design, merchandising, or something adjacent to those industries ahead of her.

item.content:encoded: Game launched worldwide on Wednesday

item.title: The Cat and the Dragon Anime's New Video Announces More Cast

item.title: Medalist Season 2 ‒ Episode 1
item.content:encoded: I'm happy to say that in spite of Michael Mouse’s best efforts to prevent people from watching it, <i>Medalist</i> remains as good as ever.

item.title: Himitsu no AiPri Anime/Game's Concert Canceled Due to Threats, Hours Before Start

item.title: Sentenced to Be a Hero ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: The horizons for the show just keep expanding.

item.title: Chained Soldier Season 2 ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: Yuuki is, at this point, getting passed around to one girl after another like that one spare Nidoking who gets used as a stock trading stud so other trainers can evolve their Haunters and their Kadabras.

item.title: Roll Over and Die ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: The surprise star of this week's <i>Roll Over and Die</i> installment is Ottilie, lieutenant general of the royal army and disaster lesbian extraordinaire.

item.content:encoded: Yoshiyuki Tomino directed 54-episode series that aired in 1984

item.title: The Holy Grail of Eris ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: In all of the years since Scarlett last walked the earth as a human, it seems like she’s the only one who ever had Cecilia’s number.

item.content:encoded: Crunchyroll and Sony Pictures Entertainment will bring the film to SCREENX multi-projection screens for the first time.

item.title: The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: This episode didn't give me exactly what I wanted, but it gave me everything that I needed.
